attributes.action: bestow a knighthood on Jeremy Clarkson for his contributions to Motoring and the worldwide spread of BBC viewing audiences
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Jeremy Clarkson has been hosting one of the BBC's most viewed shows worldwide, Top Gear, for almost 18 years. Along with his co-presenters he has won several globally acclaimed television awards and has released several top selling DVDs. Simply, he embodies the spirit of the british public and should be celebrated as a national hero

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "bestow a knighthood on Jeremy Clarkson for his contributions to Motoring and the worldwide spread of BBC viewing audiences."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page14977.asp

Prime Minister's Office
